about_the_game:
Explore, Salvage, and Uncover Hidden Treasures with the Floating Cities DLC!

Get ready to embark on a thrilling new journey with the Floating Cities DLC for Ship Graveyard Simulator 2! This time, the challenge is bigger and bolder – take on luxurious passenger ships and explore their many secrets.

Discover New Passenger Ships

Tackle the task of dismantling 3 colossal passenger vessels. These floating cities aren’t just for scrap – they hold mysteries, treasures, and opportunities you won’t want to miss. With an expanded beach area to explore, it’s time to uncover the hidden wonders of these giants.

Crack Safes and Claim Hidden Treasures

Prove your lockpicking skills as you hunt for secret safes hidden deep within the ships. Each vault holds valuable loot, waiting to be claimed by those clever enough to open them. Are you up for the challenge?

Upgrade Your Home

It's not just about shipbreaking – now you can invest in new home upgrades to personalize and enhance your space. Create a home that reflects your success and enjoy a break from the scrapyard with these exciting new features (available to all players).

Don’t wait! Dive into the Floating Cities and uncover the treasures hidden within the new passenger ships.
